content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mary! Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability?
Sure, I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you, Mary. I see that your address is within our service area. What kind of service do you need today? We handle plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services.
I'd like to get HVAC service, please.
Got it. When would be an ideal time for our technician to visit you for the HVAC service?
I'm not sure yet. I want to get quotes from a few other companies first before scheduling anything.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling.

content: I understand, Mary. Please feel free to reach out whenever you're ready to schedule an appointment. If you have any questions, I'm here to help! Have a great day!
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling.
